mapper.select: select shop_seq, shop_name, shop_register, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_off from T_HAIRSHOP
mapper.update: update T_HAIRSHOP set shop_off=#{shop_off}, shop_address=#{shop_address}, shop_phone=#{shop_phone}, shop_start=#{shop_start}, shop_end=#{shop_end}, shop_image=#{shop_image}, shop_intro=#{shop_intro}, shop_tag=#{shop_tag} where shop_seq=#{shop_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HAIRSHOP (shop_name, shop_register, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_off) VALUES (#{shop_name},#{shop_register},#{shop_address},#{shop_phone},#{shop_intro},#{shop_image},#{shop_start},#{shop_end}, shop_off)

INSERT INTO T_HAIRSHOP (shop_name, shop_register, shop_id, shop_pw, shop_address, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_phone, shop_off, shop_tag) VALUES (#{shop_name}, #{shop_register}, #{shop_id}, #{shop_pw}, #{shop_address}, #{shop_intro}, #{shop_image}, #{shop_start}, #{shop_end}, #{shop_phone}, #{shop_off}, #{shop_tag})
mapper.select: select temp_seq,te.shop_seq, st.staff_name as title, temp_offday as date from T_TEMPDAY te LEFT JOIN T_STAFF st ON te.staff_seq = st.staff_seq where te.shop_seq=#{shop_seq}
